description: This Java class defines a JPA entity named 'Note' representing a simple note with title and content, including timestamp management for creation and updates.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: JPA entity for a note with fields for id, title, content, createdAt, and updatedAt, with lifecycle callbacks for persisting and updating timestamps.

methods.name: Note
methods.description: Default constructor for the Note class.

methods.name: Note
methods.description: Constructor initializing a Note with a title and content.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Lifecycle callback annotated with @PrePersist to set creation and update timestamps.

methods.name: onUpdate
methods.description: Lifecycle callback annotated with @PreUpdate to update the updatedAt timestamp.
